title: [Frozen Garden, Clearing]
description: Several small shrubs and bushes define the edge of a small clearing.  A lone oak tree stands in the middle of the clearing, its bare limbs reaching towards the sky as if pleading for the warmth of the sun.
Several small shrubs and bushes define the edge of a small clearing.  A lone oak tree stands in the middle of the clearing, its bare limbs reaching towards the sky, silhouetted in the moonlight.
paths: Obvious paths: north, east, southeast, west
